Name: 爆裂魔弹
Description: 对所有敌人造成{0}点伤害。

Name: 魔力铸金
Description: 获得{0}枚金币,注能1:再触发一次.

Name: 装甲结晶
Description: 获得{0}点护盾,获得{1}层坚盾。

Name: 终结一击
Description: 结束本回合,对所有敌人造成{0}点伤害。
Description_en: End this turn and deals {0} damage to all enemies.

Name: 黄金落幕
Description: 结束本回合,对所有敌人造成{0}点伤害,获得接受伤害加成的{1}枚金币，最多不超过100枚。
Description_en: End this turn, deal {0} damage to all enemies, and gain {1} gold coin for each damage taken, up to a maximum of 100 gold coins.

Name: 正义之怒
Description: 对敌方造成自身已损失生命30%的伤害。
Description_en: Deal damage equal to 30% of your lost health to enemies.

Name: 复仇链枪
Description: 对随机目标造成自身已损失生命50%的伤害。
Description_en: Deal damage equal to 50% of your lost health to a random target.

Name: 寰宇诸星大爆发
Description: 净化自身全部负面状态,对所有敌人造成{0}点伤害。
Description_en: Purify all negative status effects on yourself and deal {0} damage to all enemies.
